results.title: Total Sales Amount
results.raw_response: Total Sales = SUM(Sales[Net Price])
results.dax: Total Sales = SUM(Sales[Net Price])
results.name: Total Sales
results.expression: SUM(Sales[Net Price])
results.validation_query: EVALUATE ROW("Total Sales", SUM(Sales[Net Price]))

results.title: Count of Customers
results.raw_response: Customer Count = COUNTROWS(Customer)
results.dax: Customer Count = COUNTROWS(Customer)
results.name: Customer Count
results.expression: COUNTROWS(Customer)
results.validation_query: EVALUATE ROW("Customer Count", COUNTROWS(Customer))

results.title: Product Percentage of Category Total
results.raw_response:
Category Share % = 
VAR CurrentProductSales =
    CALCULATE(
        SUM(Sales[Net Price])
    )
VAR CurrentCategory = Product[Category]
VAR CategoryTotalSales =
    CALCULATE(
        SUM(Sales[Net Price]),
        FILTER(
            ALL(Product),
            Product[Category] = CurrentCategory
        )
    )
RETURN
    DIVIDE(CurrentProductSales, CategoryTotalSales, 0) * 100
results.dax:
Category Share % = 
VAR CurrentProductSales =
    CALCULATE(
        SUM(Sales[Net Price])
    )
VAR CurrentCategory = Product[Category]
VAR CategoryTotalSales =
    CALCULATE(
        SUM(Sales[Net Price]),
        FILTER(
            ALL(Product),
            Product[Category] = CurrentCategory
        )
    )
RETURN
    DIVIDE(CurrentProductSales, CategoryTotalSales, 0) * 100
results.name: Category Share %
results.expression:
VAR CurrentProductSales =
    CALCULATE(
        SUM(Sales[Net Price])
    )
VAR CurrentCategory = Product[Category]
VAR CategoryTotalSales =
    CALCULATE(
        SUM(Sales[Net Price]),
        FILTER(
            ALL(Product),
            Product[Category] = CurrentCategory
        )
    )
RETURN
    DIVIDE(CurrentProductSales, CategoryTotalSales, 0) * 100
results.validation_query:
EVALUATE TOPN(5, ADDCOLUMNS(Sales, "Category Share %", VAR CurrentProductSales =
    CALCULATE(
        SUM(Sales[Net Price])
    )
VAR CurrentCategory = Product[Category]
VAR CategoryTotalSales =
    CALCULATE(
        SUM(Sales[Net Price]),
        FILTER(
            ALL(Product),
            Product[Category] = CurrentCategory
        )
    )
RETURN
    DIVIDE(CurrentProductSales, CategoryTotalSales, 0) * 100))

results.title: Granularity-Aware Measure with VALUES
results.raw_response:
Smart Sales = 
IF(
    HASONEVALUE('Date'[Year]) && NOT(HASONEVALUE('Date'[Month])),
    SUM(Sales[Net Price]),
    IF(
        HASONEVALUE('Date'[Month]),
        AVERAGEX(
            VALUES('Date'[Month]),
            CALCULATE(SUM(Sales[Net Price]))
        ),
        SUM(Sales[Net Price])
    )
)
results.dax:
Smart Sales = 
IF(
    HASONEVALUE('Date'[Year]) && NOT(HASONEVALUE('Date'[Month])),
    SUM(Sales[Net Price]),
    IF(
        HASONEVALUE('Date'[Month]),
        AVERAGEX(
            VALUES('Date'[Month]),
            CALCULATE(SUM(Sales[Net Price]))
        ),
        SUM(Sales[Net Price])
    )
)
results.name: Smart Sales
results.expression:
IF(
    HASONEVALUE('Date'[Year]) && NOT(HASONEVALUE('Date'[Month])),
    SUM(Sales[Net Price]),
    IF(
        HASONEVALUE('Date'[Month]),
        AVERAGEX(
            VALUES('Date'[Month]),
            CALCULATE(SUM(Sales[Net Price]))
        ),
        SUM(Sales[Net Price])
    )
)
results.validation_query:
EVALUATE ROW("Smart Sales", IF(
    HASONEVALUE('Date'[Year]) && NOT(HASONEVALUE('Date'[Month])),
    SUM(Sales[Net Price]),
    IF(
        HASONEVALUE('Date'[Month]),
        AVERAGEX(
            VALUES('Date'[Month]),
            CALCULATE(SUM(Sales[Net Price]))
        ),
        SUM(Sales[Net Price])
    )
))

results.dax: Sales Rank = RANKX(ALL(Product), CALCULATE(SUM(Sales[Net Price])), , DESC, Dense)

results.expression: RANKX(ALL(Product), CALCULATE(SUM(Sales[Net Price])), , DESC, Dense)

results.title: Top 5 Products with TOPN
results.raw_response:
Top 5 Sales = 
VAR CurrentProduct = SELECTEDVALUE(Product[ProductKey])
VAR ProductSalesTable =
    ADDCOLUMNS(
        ALLSELECTED(Product[ProductKey]),
        "@TotalSales", CALCULATE(SUM(Sales[Net Price]))
    )
VAR RankedProducts =
    ADDCOLUMNS(
        ProductSalesTable,
        "@Rank", RANKX(ProductSalesTable, [@TotalSales], , DESC, DENSE)
    )
VAR Top5Products =
    FILTER(RankedProducts, [@Rank] <= 5)
VAR IsInTop5 =
    COUNTROWS(FILTER(Top5Products, [ProductKey] = CurrentProduct)) >
results.dax:
Top 5 Sales = 
VAR CurrentProduct = SELECTEDVALUE(Product[ProductKey])
VAR ProductSalesTable =
    ADDCOLUMNS(
        ALLSELECTED(Product[ProductKey]),
        "@TotalSales", CALCULATE(SUM(Sales[Net Price]))
    )
VAR RankedProducts =
    ADDCOLUMNS(
        ProductSalesTable,
        "@Rank", RANKX(ProductSalesTable, [@TotalSales], , DESC, DENSE)
    )
VAR Top5Products =
    FILTER(RankedProducts, [@Rank] <= 5)
VAR IsInTop5 =
    COUNTROWS(FILTER(Top5Products, [ProductKey] = CurrentProduct)) > 0
VAR CurrentProductSales =
    CALCULATE(SUM(Sales[Net Price]))
RETURN
    IF(IsInTop5, CurrentProductSales, BLANK())
results.name: Top 5 Sales
results.expression:
VAR CurrentProduct = SELECTEDVALUE(Product[ProductKey])
VAR ProductSalesTable =
    ADDCOLUMNS(
        ALLSELECTED(Product[ProductKey]),
        "@TotalSales", CALCULATE(SUM(Sales[Net Price]))
    )
VAR RankedProducts =
    ADDCOLUMNS(
        ProductSalesTable,
        "@Rank", RANKX(ProductSalesTable, [@TotalSales], , DESC, DENSE)
    )
VAR Top5Products =
    FILTER(RankedProducts, [@Rank] <= 5)
VAR IsInTop5 =
    COUNTROWS(FILTER(Top5Products, [ProductKey] = CurrentProduct)) > 0
VAR CurrentProductSales =
    CALCULATE(SUM(Sales[Net Price]))
RETURN
    IF(IsInTop5, CurrentProductSales, BLANK())
results.validation_query:
EVALUATE ROW("Top 5 Sales", VAR CurrentProduct = SELECTEDVALUE(Product[ProductKey])
VAR ProductSalesTable =
    ADDCOLUMNS(
        ALLSELECTED(Product[ProductKey]),
        "@TotalSales", CALCULATE(SUM(Sales[Net Price]))
    )
VAR RankedProducts =
    ADDCOLUMNS(
        ProductSalesTable,
        "@Rank", RANKX(ProductSalesTable, [@TotalSales], , DESC, DENSE)
    )
VAR Top5Products =
    FILTER(RankedProducts, [@Rank] <= 5)
VAR IsInTop5 =
    COUNTROWS(FILTER(Top5Products, [ProductKey] = CurrentProduct)) > 0
VAR CurrentProductSales =
    CALCULATE(SUM(Sales[Net Price]))
RETURN
    IF(IsInTop5, CurrentProductSales, BLANK()))

results.title: Safe Ratio with Cascading Fallbacks
results.raw_response:
Profit Margin % =
VAR TotalNetPrice = SUM(Sales[Net Price])
VAR TotalUnitCost = SUM(Sales[Unit Cost])
VAR MarginCalculation =
    DIVIDE(TotalNetPrice - TotalUnitCost, TotalNetPrice, 0) * 100
RETURN
    IF(
        TotalNetPrice = 0 || ISBLANK(TotalNetPrice),
        0,
        IF(MarginCalculation < 0, 0, MarginCalculation)
    )
results.dax:
Profit Margin % =
VAR TotalNetPrice = SUM(Sales[Net Price])
VAR TotalUnitCost = SUM(Sales[Unit Cost])
VAR MarginCalculation =
    DIVIDE(TotalNetPrice - TotalUnitCost, TotalNetPrice, 0) * 100
RETURN
    IF(
        TotalNetPrice = 0 || ISBLANK(TotalNetPrice),
        0,
        IF(MarginCalculation < 0, 0, MarginCalculation)
    )
results.name: Profit Margin %
results.expression:
VAR TotalNetPrice = SUM(Sales[Net Price])
VAR TotalUnitCost = SUM(Sales[Unit Cost])
VAR MarginCalculation =
    DIVIDE(TotalNetPrice - TotalUnitCost, TotalNetPrice, 0) * 100
RETURN
    IF(
        TotalNetPrice = 0 || ISBLANK(TotalNetPrice),
        0,
        IF(MarginCalculation < 0, 0, MarginCalculation)
    )
results.validation_query:
EVALUATE ROW("Profit Margin %", VAR TotalNetPrice = SUM(Sales[Net Price])
VAR TotalUnitCost = SUM(Sales[Unit Cost])
VAR MarginCalculation =
    DIVIDE(TotalNetPrice - TotalUnitCost, TotalNetPrice, 0) * 100
RETURN
    IF(
        TotalNetPrice = 0 || ISBLANK(TotalNetPrice),
        0,
        IF(MarginCalculation < 0, 0, MarginCalculation)
    ))

results.title: Safe Year-over-Year with Missing Data
results.raw_response:
Safe YoY Change = 
VAR CurrentYearSales = SUM(Sales[Net Price])
VAR PreviousYearSales = 
    CALCULATE(
        SUM(Sales[Net Price]),
        SAMEPERIODLASTYEAR('Date'[Date])
    )
VAR YoYChange = CurrentYearSales - PreviousYearSales
RETURN
    SWITCH(
        TRUE(),
        ISBLANK(CurrentYearSales) && ISBLANK(PreviousYearSales), 0,
        ISBLANK(PreviousYearSales), CurrentYearSales,
        YoYChange
    )
results.dax:
Safe YoY Change = 
VAR CurrentYearSales = SUM(Sales[Net Price])
VAR PreviousYearSales = 
    CALCULATE(
        SUM(Sales[Net Price]),
        SAMEPERIODLASTYEAR('Date'[Date])
    )
VAR YoYChange = CurrentYearSales - PreviousYearSales
RETURN
    SWITCH(
        TRUE(),
        ISBLANK(CurrentYearSales) && ISBLANK(PreviousYearSales), 0,
        ISBLANK(PreviousYearSales), CurrentYearSales,
        YoYChange
    )
results.name: Safe YoY Change
results.expression:
VAR CurrentYearSales = SUM(Sales[Net Price])
VAR PreviousYearSales = 
    CALCULATE(
        SUM(Sales[Net Price]),
        SAMEPERIODLASTYEAR('Date'[Date])
    )
VAR YoYChange = CurrentYearSales - PreviousYearSales
RETURN
    SWITCH(
        TRUE(),
        ISBLANK(CurrentYearSales) && ISBLANK(PreviousYearSales), 0,
        ISBLANK(PreviousYearSales), CurrentYearSales,
        YoYChange
    )
results.validation_query:
EVALUATE ROW("Safe YoY Change", VAR CurrentYearSales = SUM(Sales[Net Price])
VAR PreviousYearSales = 
    CALCULATE(
        SUM(Sales[Net Price]),
        SAMEPERIODLASTYEAR('Date'[Date])
    )
VAR YoYChange = CurrentYearSales - PreviousYearSales
RETURN
    SWITCH(
        TRUE(),
        ISBLANK(CurrentYearSales) && ISBLANK(PreviousYearSales), 0,
        ISBLANK(PreviousYearSales), CurrentYearSales,
        YoYChange
    ))

results.title: Year-over-Year Growth Percentage
results.raw_response:
YoY Growth % = 
VAR CurrentYearSales = SUM(Sales[Net Price])
VAR PreviousYearSales = CALCULATE(SUM(Sales[Net Price]), SAMEPERIODLASTYEAR('Date'[Date]))
RETURN
DIVIDE(CurrentYearSales - PreviousYearSales, PreviousYearSales, BLANK())
results.dax:
YoY Growth % = 
VAR CurrentYearSales = SUM(Sales[Net Price])
VAR PreviousYearSales = CALCULATE(SUM(Sales[Net Price]), SAMEPERIODLASTYEAR('Date'[Date]))
RETURN
DIVIDE(CurrentYearSales - PreviousYearSales, PreviousYearSales, BLANK())
results.name: YoY Growth %
results.expression:
VAR CurrentYearSales = SUM(Sales[Net Price])
VAR PreviousYearSales = CALCULATE(SUM(Sales[Net Price]), SAMEPERIODLASTYEAR('Date'[Date]))
RETURN

results.validation_query:
EVALUATE ROW("YoY Growth %", VAR CurrentYearSales = SUM(Sales[Net Price])
VAR PreviousYearSales = CALCULATE(SUM(Sales[Net Price]), SAMEPERIODLASTYEAR('Date'[Date]))
RETURN

results.title: Running Total with CALCULATE and FILTER
results.raw_response:
Running Total = 
VAR CurrentDate = MAX('Date'[Date])
VAR CurrentYear = YEAR(CurrentDate)
RETURN
CALCULATE(
    SUM(Sales[Net Price]),
    FILTER(
        ALL('Date'),
        'Date'[Date] <= CurrentDate && 'Date'[Year] = CurrentYear
    )
)
results.dax:
Running Total = 
VAR CurrentDate = MAX('Date'[Date])
VAR CurrentYear = YEAR(CurrentDate)
RETURN
CALCULATE(
    SUM(Sales[Net Price]),
    FILTER(
        ALL('Date'),
        'Date'[Date] <= CurrentDate && 'Date'[Year] = CurrentYear
    )
)

    )

results.validation_query:
EVALUATE ROW("Running Total", VAR CurrentDate = MAX('Date'[Date])
VAR CurrentYear = YEAR(CurrentDate)

results.title: Union of High-Value Transactions
results.raw_response:
Special Orders =
UNION(
    SELECTCOLUMNS(
        FILTER(Sales, Sales[Net Price] > 1000),
        "Order Number", Sales[Order Number],
        "Net Price", Sales[Net Price],
        "Quantity", Sales[Quantity]
    ),
    SELECTCOLUMNS(
        FILTER(Sales, Sales[Quantity] > 10),
        "Order Number", Sales[Order Number],
        "Net Price", Sales[Net Price],
        "Quantity", Sales[Quantity]
    )
)
results.dax:
Special Orders =
UNION(
    SELECTCOLUMNS(
        FILTER(Sales, Sales[Net Price] > 1000),
        "Order Number", Sales[Order Number],
        "Net Price", Sales[Net Price],
        "Quantity", Sales[Quantity]
    ),
    SELECTCOLUMNS(
        FILTER(Sales, Sales[Quantity] > 10),
        "Order Number", Sales[Order Number],
        "Net Price", Sales[Net Price],
        "Quantity", Sales[Quantity]
    )
)
results.name: Special Orders
results.expression:
UNION(
    SELECTCOLUMNS(
        FILTER(Sales, Sales[Net Price] > 1000),
        "Order Number", Sales[Order Number],
        "Net Price", Sales[Net Price],
        "Quantity", Sales[Quantity]
    ),
    SELECTCOLUMNS(
        FILTER(Sales, Sales[Quantity] > 10),
        "Order Number", Sales[Order Number],
        "Net Price", Sales[Net Price],
        "Quantity", Sales[Quantity]
    )
)
results.validation_query:
EVALUATE UNION(
    SELECTCOLUMNS(
        FILTER(Sales, Sales[Net Price] > 1000),
        "Order Number", Sales[Order Number],
        "Net Price", Sales[Net Price],
        "Quantity", Sales[Quantity]
    ),
    SELECTCOLUMNS(
        FILTER(Sales, Sales[Quantity] > 10),
        "Order Number", Sales[Order Number],
        "Net Price", Sales[Net Price],
        "Quantity", Sales[Quantity]
    )
)

results.title: Virtual Relationship with TREATAS
results.raw_response:
Budget vs Actual = 
VAR ActualSales = SUM(Sales[Net Price])
VAR BudgetAmount = 
    CALCULATE(
        SUM(Budget[Budget Amount]),
        TREATAS(VALUES('Date'[Year]), Budget[Year])
    )
RETURN
    ActualSales - BudgetAmount
results.dax:
Budget vs Actual = 
VAR ActualSales = SUM(Sales[Net Price])
VAR BudgetAmount = 
    CALCULATE(
        SUM(Budget[Budget Amount]),
        TREATAS(VALUES('Date'[Year]), Budget[Year])
    )
RETURN
    ActualSales - BudgetAmount
results.name: Budget vs Actual
results.expression:
VAR ActualSales = SUM(Sales[Net Price])
VAR BudgetAmount = 
    CALCULATE(
        SUM(Budget[Budget Amount]),
        TREATAS(VALUES('Date'[Year]), Budget[Year])
    )
RETURN
    ActualSales - BudgetAmount
results.validation_query:
EVALUATE ROW("Budget vs Actual", VAR ActualSales = SUM(Sales[Net Price])
VAR BudgetAmount = 
    CALCULATE(
        SUM(Budget[Budget Amount]),
        TREATAS(VALUES('Date'[Year]), Budget[Year])
    )
RETURN
    ActualSales - BudgetAmount)

results.title: 90th Percentile Order Value
results.raw_response: P90 Order Value = PERCENTILEX.INC(Sales, Sales[Net Price], 0.9)
results.dax: P90 Order Value = PERCENTILEX.INC(Sales, Sales[Net Price], 0.9)
results.name: P90 Order Value
results.expression: PERCENTILEX.INC(Sales, Sales[Net Price], 0.9)

results.title: 3-Month Rolling Average
results.raw_response:
Rolling 3M Avg Sales = 
VAR CurrentMonthSales = SUM(Sales[Net Price])
VAR Month1Back = 
    CALCULATE(
        SUM(Sales[Net Price]),
        DATEADD('Date'[Date], -1, MONTH)
    )
VAR Month2Back = 
    CALCULATE(
        SUM(Sales[Net Price]),
        DATEADD('Date'[Date], -2, MONTH)
    )
VAR TotalSales = CurrentMonthSales + Month1Back + Month2Back
RETURN
    DIVIDE(TotalSales, 3)
results.dax:
Rolling 3M Avg Sales = 
VAR CurrentMonthSales = SUM(Sales[Net Price])
VAR Month1Back = 
    CALCULATE(
        SUM(Sales[Net Price]),
        DATEADD('Date'[Date], -1, MONTH)
    )
VAR Month2Back = 
    CALCULATE(
        SUM(Sales[Net Price]),
        DATEADD('Date'[Date], -2, MONTH)
    )
VAR TotalSales = CurrentMonthSales + Month1Back + Month2Back
RETURN
    DIVIDE(TotalSales, 3)

RETURN
    DIVIDE(TotalSales, 3))

results.title: Fiscal Year-to-Date (July Start)
results.raw_response:
Fiscal YTD Sales = 
CALCULATE(
    SUM(Sales[Net Price]),
    DATESYTD('Date'[Date], "6-30")
)
